detectors.description: Buttcoin.transfer(address,uint256) () uses a weak PRNG: "fee = ((uint256(sha3()(now)) % 10) * _value) / 1000 ()"
Buttcoin.approve(address,uint256) () uses a weak PRNG: "approvalTime[uint256(sha3()(msg.sender,_spender))] = now + (uint256(sha3()(now)) % (86400)) ()"
Buttcoin () has incorrect ERC20 function interface:Buttcoin.transfer(address,uint256) ()

Buttcoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) () uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- balanceOf[_from] < _value ()
	- approvalTime[uint256(sha3()(_from,_to))] > now ()
	- balanceOf[_to] + _value < balanceOf[_to] ()
detectors.markdown:
[Buttcoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)]() uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- [balanceOf[_from] < _value]()
	- [approvalTime[uint256(sha3()(_from,_to))] > now]()
	- [balanceOf[_to] + _value < balanceOf[_to]]()
